Author: someforgottentoramers7670
Content:
I would say 02 Voter don't deserve the hate, at most, they, who knowingly vote for PG despite all odds, deserve the dislike ( a tamer version of hate, but not harmful)

There is a case where an individual voted for 02 due to his feelings masked with "pick lesser evil between the three" rather than rationality. It can't be helped,  people are entitled to their own subjective standard, and some of them will follow through it no matter how bad the reality is. 

At this point, there is no use to talk over a spilled porridge. No one can expect any change for them. Instead, people whom have conscience and common sense over this event should focus on themselves as people with a united voice.

*How to rally like-minded people together to form a consistent, loud, and powerful voice during these years*
*What can people do to prevent another similae situation happen in the near future, 2029 General Election*
*What's the midgame and endgame of this struggle to correct the Indonesia's political realm once and for all*

Author: someforgottentoramers7670
Content:
**About Money Politics**, it is inevitable, it is a given due to the Konoha's thingy of how things are done mostly through money.

*Common people need money live through their lives*
* The ambitious running-for-election politician need money to win over people*
*Political Party's higher ups need money to run consolidate power within their own party*

It is a devilish progress where the spirit of democracy is lost mid way. People should pay attention and realize this, It is a rigged game the elites made along the way.


 Instead of letting these multiple Political parties' elites----who claimed to represent certain kind of people yet barely distinguishable unless they have enough money----to rigg the game going on for another decade...

Let's have a system similar to Cerdas Cermas's system yet more complex!
 Get an independent political institution to look over the running candidate's campaign necessities and regulate and enforce how the running candidate compete in election. That way, anyone can compete for election without worrying about money. 
*Not allowed to bring money, therefore no longer able to bribe people*
*Already being sponsored, thus no reason to look for "donatur"*
*All that's left is who is "smart" enough to win the voter's vote*
